MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG1 postcode area of Dumfries. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.50am to carry out repairs to faulty electrical equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.24am on Monday 15th March 2021.
